review: This movie may be the best movie i have ever watched ever. The sound track for this movie is great! all these characters are so welly developed it is such a surreal environment. I can guarantee there is no other movie where a child is home alone and two house buglers terrorize him. This is original, genius, and frankly the funniest thing i have seen. But then again i could only understand 1/34 of the dialogue.
Hari Puttar is an amazing film, everything about this film is pure goodness. I feel like it should be mandatory to force your children to watch this movie at least once. Fun for the entire family.
A cinematic masterpiece. It's so good that others tried to imitate it. There's this terrible rip-off called Harry Potter. I'd stay far away from that one.
Its a copy of home alone with exact same scenario. Totally messed up movie . Good for kids. But wasnt that much of a fun compared to orignal.
It's pretty good. I don't like the texture. Too crunchy :/ Hari Puttar needs some pepper. he kinda w a c k tho 🤭😳🥰😳🤭

This is a cinematic masterpiece. Some people say that the Godfather is the best film of all time, but when you show this to them, they will automatically change their minds. I have no flaws with this movie, super amazing theme, it will be stuck in your head for the rest of all eternity looping until your death.
